item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 at 1:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Factorio Learning Environment – Agents Build Factories (92 points | 29 comments)
2. Representing Type Lattices Compactly (9 points | 1 comment)
3. What Makes Code Hard to Read: Visual Patterns of Complexity (2023) (53 points | 26 comments)
4. Show HN: Seven39, a social media app that is only open for 3 hours every evening (446 points | 239 comments)
5. Local Deep Research – ArXiv, wiki and other searches included (50 points | 8 comments)
6. Sidekick: Local-first native macOS LLM app (114 points | 25 comments)
7. Kissing moons may explain why Earth's moon is so large (36 points | 12 comments)
8. Bending Spacetime in the Basement (1997) (175 points | 28 comments)
9. Bel in Clojure (2022) (77 points | 4 comments)
10. Neonatal fungi: lifelong metabolic health via macrophage β cell development (38 points | 5 comments)
11. Mathematical Foundations of Reinforcement Learning (349 points | 33 comments)
12. Canon EF and RF Lenses – All Autofocus Motors (474 points | 112 comments)
13. Formal Verification of Zero-Downtime Database Migration in PlusCal (19 points | 1 comment)
14. What made the Irish famine so deadly (249 points | 367 comments)
15. An election forecast that’s 50-50 is not “giving up” (82 points | 117 comments)
16. Shef (94 points | 35 comments)
17. The Einstein AI Model (213 points | 179 comments)

20. HyperShell X Outdoor PowerSuit Exoskeleton (96 points | 50 comments)
21. How to Implement a Cosine Similarity Function in TypeScript (81 points | 35 comments)
22. Extreme poverty in India has dropped to negligible levels (131 points | 118 comments)
23. A technical history of Acorn Computers (111 points | 48 comments)
24. STEPS Toward the Reinvention of Programming (2012) [pdf] (88 points | 56 comments)
25. Music labels will regret coming for the Internet Archive, sound historian says (442 points | 145 comments)
26. Arranging invisible icons in quadratic time (2021) (46 points | 19 comments)
27. Probabilistic Artificial Intelligence (331 points | 83 comments)
28. Planes are having their GPS hacked. Could new clocks keep them safe? (178 points | 256 comments)
29. Trees not profits: we're giving up our right to ever sell Ecosia (2018) (324 points | 200 comments)
30. Zero-Downtime Kubernetes Deployments on AWS with EKS (168 points | 97 comments)
